channel.title: How can I make my spirit beast hit harder?
channel.description: My spirit beat hits continuous 0's, how can I change it so he hits higher? I know it's in client.java, but where?

item.title: How can I make my spirit beast hit harder?
item.dc:creator: @DemonsworldOwner DemonsworldOwner
item.description:
@DemonsworldOwner wrote:

Mr. Despair:

hitDiff is in client.java so yeah it is.

I ment the main part isit…

Read full topic
item.source: How can I make my spirit beast hit harder?

item.title: How can I make my spirit beast hit harder?
item.dc:creator: @VelocityX VelocityX
item.description:
@VelocityX wrote:

Ugh… is moparscape forum users this dense?

The reason your “spirit beast” is hitting 0’s is because you never did anything to change it…

look for npchandler.java, Im guessing your using Delta so here is a basic hit code for you…

                                } else if(npcs[NPCID].npcType == #### && !plr.ProtMelee) {

npcs[NPCID].animNumber = ####;
hitDiff = ##+misc.random(##);

Read full topic
